validAddress","type":"address"}],"name":"InvalidAccessManagerAddress","type":"error"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"enum ContractSpecificRoles","name":"roleName","type":"uint8"},{"internalType":"address","name":"roleTargetContract","type":"address"}],"name":"generateRole","outputs":[{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"","type":"bytes32"}],"stateMutability":"pure","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"details":"This contract extends LimitedAccessControl, which restricts direct role management. Roles are typically assigned during deployment or through governance proposals. The contract defines four main roles: 1. GOVERNOR_ROLE: System-wide administrators 2. KEEPER_ROLE: Routine maintenance operators 3. SUPER_KEEPER_ROLE: Advanced maintenance operators 4. COMMANDER_ROLE: Managers of specific protocol components (Arks) Role Hierarchy and Management: - The GOVERNOR_ROLE is at the top of the hierarchy and can manage all other roles. - Other roles cannot manage roles directly due to LimitedAccessControl restrictions. - Role assignments are typically done through governance proposals or during initial setup. Usage in the System: - Other contracts in the system inherit from ProtocolAccessManaged, which checks permissions   against this ProtocolAccessManager. - Critical functions in various contracts are protected by role-based modifiers   (e.g., onlyGovernor, onlyKeeper, etc.) which query this contract for permissions. Security Considerations: - The GOVERNOR_ROLE has significant power and should be managed carefully, potentially   through a multi-sig wallet or governance contract. - The SUPER_KEEPER_ROLE has elevated privileges and should be assigned judiciously. - The COMMANDER_ROLE is not directly manageable through this contract but is used   in other parts of the system for specific access control.","kind":"dev","methods":{"constructor":{"details":"Validates the provided accessManager address and initializes the _accessManager","params":{"accessManager":"Address of the ProtocolAccessManager contract"}},"generateRole(uint8,address)":{"details":"This function is used to create unique role identifiers for contract-specific roles","params":{"roleName":"The name of the role","roleTargetContract":"The address of the contract the role is for"},"returns":{"_0":"The generated role identifier"}}},"title":"ProtocolAccessManager","version":1},"userdoc":{"errors":{"CallerIsNotAdmin(address)":[{"notice":"Thrown when a caller is not an admin."}],"CallerIsNotAuthorizedToBoard(address)":[{"notice":"Thrown when a caller is not authorized to board."}],"CallerIsNotCommander(address)":[{"notice":"Thrown when a caller is not the commander."}],"CallerIsNotContractSpecificRole(address,bytes32)":[{"notice":"Thrown when a caller does not have the required role."}],"CallerIsNotCurator(address)":[{"notice":"Thrown when a caller is not the curator."}],"CallerIsNotGovernor(address)":[{"notice":"Thrown when a caller is not the governor."}],"CallerIsNotGuardian(address)":[{"notice":"Thrown when a caller is not the guardian."}],"CallerIsNotGuardianOrGovernor(address)":[{"notice":"Thrown when a caller is not the guardian or governor."}],"CallerIsNotKeeper(address)":[{"notice":"Thrown when a caller is not a keeper."}],"CallerIsNotRaft(address)":[{"notice":"Thrown when a caller is not the Raft."}],"CallerIsNotRaftOrCommander(address)":[{"notice":"Thrown when a caller is neither the Raft nor the commander."}],"CallerIsNotSuperKeeper(address)":[{"notice":"Thrown when a caller is not a super keeper."}],"DirectGrantIsDisabled(address)":[{"notice":"Thrown when direct grant is disabled."}],"DirectRevokeIsDisabled(address)":[{"notice":"Thrown when direct revoke is disabled."}],"InvalidAccessManagerAddress(address)":[{"notice":"Thrown when an invalid access manager address is provided."}]},"kind":"user","methods":{"constructor":{"notice":"Initializes the ProtocolAccessManaged contract"},"generateRole(uint8,address)":{"notice":"Generates a role identifier for a specific contract and role"}},"notice":"This contract is the central authority for access control within the protocol. It defines and manages various roles that govern different aspects of the
